00027 #include <stdlib.h>
00028 
00029 #include <pthread.h>
00030 
00031 #include "lnp_link.h"
00032 #include "lnp_history_table.h"
00033 
00034 /*============================================================================*/
00035 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00036 /*============================================================================*/
00037 
00038 void lnp_history_insert(history_entry_t *entry, int session) {
00039         /* O(1) */
00040         entry->history[entry->end] = session;
00041         entry->end = (entry->end+1) % HISTORY_SIZE;
00042         if (entry->end == entry->begin) {
00043                 entry->begin = (entry->begin+1) % HISTORY_SIZE;
00044         }
00045 }
00046 /******************************************************************************/
00047 int lnp_history_get_route(history_entry_t *entry, int session_from) {
00048         /* O(n) */
00049         double aux;
00050         int used_size;
00051         int tmp;
00052         int i;
00053         
00054 retry_label:    
00055         
00056         aux = (double)rand()/RAND_MAX;
00057         used_size = (entry->end - entry->begin + HISTORY_SIZE) % HISTORY_SIZE;
00058         tmp = (int)(aux*used_size) + entry->begin;
00059         tmp %= HISTORY_SIZE;
00060         
00061         /* Try from tmp to the end */
00062         for (i = tmp; i != entry->end; i = (i+1)%HISTORY_SIZE) {
00063                 if (entry->history[i] != session_from) {
00064                         if (!lnp_is_session_active(entry->history[i])) {
00065                                 lnp_history_disconnect(entry, entry->history[i]);
00066                                 goto retry_label;
00067                         }
00068                         return entry->history[i];
00069                 }
00070         }
00071         /* Try from begin to tmp */
00072         for (i = entry->begin; i != tmp; i = (i+1)%HISTORY_SIZE) {
00073                 if (entry->history[i] != session_from) {
00074                         if (!lnp_is_session_active(entry->history[i])) {
00075                                 lnp_history_disconnect(entry, entry->history[i]);
00076                                 goto retry_label;
00077                         }
00078                         return entry->history[i];
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 
00082         return LNP_HISTORY_NO_ROUTE;
00083 }
00084 /******************************************************************************/
00085 void lnp_history_disconnect(history_entry_t *entry, int session) {
00086         /* O(n) */
00087         int i;
00088         int pos;
00089 
00090         pos = entry->begin;
00091         for (i = entry->begin; i != entry->end; i = (i+1) % HISTORY_SIZE) {
00092                 if (entry->history[i] != session) {
00093                         entry->history[pos] = entry->history[i];
00094                         pos = (pos+1) % HISTORY_SIZE;   
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         entry->end = pos;       
00098 }
00099 /******************************************************************************/
00100 void lnp_history_erase(history_entry_t *entry) {
00101         /* O(1) */
00102         entry->end = entry->begin = 0;
00103 }
00104 /******************************************************************************/
